scripts.clean: node --input-type=module -e "import { rmSync } from 'fs'; rmSync('dist', { recursive: true, force: true });"
scripts.build:assets: node --input-type=module -e "import { mkdirSync, copyFileSync } from 'fs'; mkdirSync('dist/spec', { recursive: true }); copyFileSync('spec/gamespec.schema.json', 'dist/spec/gamespec.schema.json'); copyFileSync('spec/feature-manifest.schema.json', 'dist/spec/feature-manifest.schema.json'); copyFileSync('spec/template-registry.json', 'dist/spec/template-registry.json'); copyFileSync('spec/preset.schema.json', 'dist/spec/preset.schema.json'); mkdirSync('dist/contracts/android-wrapper/v1', { recursive: true }); copyFileSync('src/contracts/android-wrapper/v1/android-wrapper.schema.json', 'dist/contracts/android-wrapper/v1/android-wrapper.schema.json');"
scripts.build: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build:ts && pnpm run build:assets
